title: Intro to Data Science
info: a live introduction to data science, completely free from Lambda School, taught by world-class instructors!

title: Experiment
info:
Any Lambda School Course - Web/iOS/Android Dev, Data Science or UX Design

You get a $1,000/month living stipend (7 months)

You pay *$0* until you're making $50k+, then 17% of salary for 3 years, capped at $40k.

title: Outreach & Community team at Lambda School.
info: This team will be working full-time to create thousands of relationships with employers and community leaders, closing the loop of graduates looking for great jobs and employers looking for great talent.

title: Lambda Next
info:
Full-time, fully-supported, post-graduate program.

Perfecting portfolios, contributing to open source, using new langs/frameworks, building into new codebases, attending and presenting at meetups, blogging, practice interviewing, and applying

title: Concierge
info: Submit one form and Lambda School will do the leg work, hand picking the perfect graduate for your team.

title: Lambda School Shop
info: Lambda Swag sales go to Perpetual Fund

title: Good Citizen
info:
Picture of homeless web developer goes viral on twitter

Lambda School responds to homeless person

Update: We’re putting him up in housing so he can focus on interviews, have a computer for him if needed, and he’ll be working with the @LambdaSchool careers team for interview practice if he doesn’t land a job quickly.

title: Experiment
info:
We’re going to pay 10 people $1,000/month ($7,000 total) to attend Lambda School’s 7 month iOS + CS program.

After you graduate you’ll pay 10% of salary for 4 years, only if you’re making $50k+, capped at $40k total

title: Lambda House
info: Free-until-hired student housing

title: Experiment
info: Our full iOS + Computer Science course (30 weeks) + a MacBook you can keep + free housing in San Francisco for the full 30 weeks.You pay $0 until you're making $50k+, then 17% of salary for 3 years, capped at $40k.We'll select 10 students.

title: Lambda Perpetual Access Fund
info:
First we will be providing a loaner computer that meets the requirements for Lambda School to any student that can’t afford one, iOS track included

Next we aim to solve housing and living expenses

title: Feynman Hour
info: At the end of every Thursday, before the sprint challenge, students are paired up and spend 30 minutes *teaching* the other students what they learned that week

title: Lambda After Hours
info:
An optional Q&A-based review from 6 PM to 8 PM Pacific every Tuesday and Thursday.

Importantly, students can attend any session for any topic, whether you're stuck that week or need a refresher.

title: Wealthfront Partnership
info: Today, we’re thrilled to announce a partnership with @LambdaSchool to teach their students good financial habits and enable them to make good choices beyond the classroom. Because everyone deserves an equal chance to succeed.

title: International Students Announcement
info: We're beginning to accept international $0 upfront students on a case-by-case basis. We'll look at a variety of factors to determine if we can invest. Minimum salary may vary. International students now use the same application for all programs.

title: Lambda School Referral Program
info:
We're rolling out the Lambda School referral program.

Refer someone to Lambda School, and when they graduate we'll pay you and them each $250.

title: iOS + Computer Science Immersive Track
info:
Lambda School is launching a 30 week (7 month) full-time iOS + Computer Science track. Created by instructors who literally created that course for Apple.

And, of course, it's 100% free until you're making $50k/yr as a developer.

title: Long Term Investment Fund Partnership
info:
Lambda School has partnered with the Long-term Education Investment Fund (Leif), which has allocated up to $50 million to  help us train untapped talent for high tech jobs at no upfront cost.

This will let us train thousands of students for the highest-paying jobs in the world, while charging them absolutely nothing until they get a job that pays $50k+

title: Launch Instagram Profile
info: Lambda School is now on Instagram. See our students' work, their stories, and more

title: Machine Learning Bootcamp
info: Lambda School's 100% free machine learning mini bootcamp begins TONIGHT!

title: Lambda School Labs
info: Our students will be writing real software on real teams and shipping for real customers as a part of the school itself.

title: The Lambda Challenge
info: If you can successfully complete this challenge, Lambda School knows it can bet on you. Pending a final interview, you'll be invited to attend Lambda School for $0 upfront, and pay NOTHING until you're making $50k+/yr

title: Lambda School Trials
info: the easiest way to try out the perfect software engineer. 1. Describe your role 2. We'll arrange back-to-back interviews with ideal students 3. Select and try them out at a flat rate. No payroll or paperwork
